backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing image replacement, placeholder audit, and deployment checklist update with affected files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for core frontend components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment checklist covering pre- and post-deployment validation for the Valentine flow and static memory images.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and applying layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell with root div and script entry for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root that renders the ValentineProposalFlow component.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Confetti: Generates and animates 100 confetti elements, removing them after animation.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Floating: Periodically spawns floating animated heart elements and cleans them up.
frontend/src/features/valentine/hooks/me: LocalStorage helper for saving, loading, and clearing memory card image data URLs.
frontend/src/features/valentine/hooks/us: Deprecated hook returning static v2 memory image paths with no upload or storage logic.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/At: Intro step showing an attention message and button to continue.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/Fi: Final step asking the Valentine question with YES/NO logic, confetti, and a moving NO button.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/He: Greeting step explaining the effort behind the website with a continue button.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/Le: Letter-style message step leading into the final question.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/Me: Displays three static memory images with captions and a button to advance.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Valentin: Centered layout wrapper applying spacing and fade-in animation.
Controls step progression and renders one of five Valentine flow steps with background effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor using the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode theming, and custom animations like floating hearts and confetti.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, plugins, and extended theme values.
project_state.json: Tracks project configuration, features, issues, and image-generation requirements for the Valentine proposal site.
